mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_name, dept_name from employee join department using(dept_code) where emp_id = #{empId} and emp_status = 'Y'
select dept_code, dept_name from department order by dept_code

select emp_id, emp_name, e.dept_code, dept_name, e.job_code, job_name from employee e join department d on(e.dept_code = d.dept_code) join job j on(e.job_code = j.job_code) where emp_status = 'Y' order by e.dept_code, e.job_code

select emp_id, emp_name, e.dept_code, dept_name, e.job_code, job_name from employee e join department d on(e.dept_code = d.dept_code) join job j on(e.job_code = j.job_code) where emp_status = 'Y'
and dept_name like '%' || #{deptName} || '%' order by job_code
and job_name like '%' || #{jobName} || '%' order by dept_code
and emp_name like '%' || #{empName} || '%' order by dept_code, job_code
mapper.insert: insert into approve_line values(#{approverEmpid}, #{docNo}, #{approveStep}, #{approveReject}, #{approveStatus}, null, null)
mapper.select: select d.doc_no, d.doc_sc, d.doc_title, e.emp_name, d.doc_department, d.doc_date, d.doc_status from draft d join employee e on(d.emp_id = e.emp_id) where d.emp_id=#{empId} UNION ALL select p.doc_no, p.doc_sc, p.doc_title, e.emp_name, p.doc_department, p.doc_date, p.doc_status from proof p join employee e on(p.emp_id = e.emp_id) where p.emp_id=#{empId} UNION ALL select v.doc_no, v.doc_sc, v.doc_title, e.emp_name, v.doc_department, v.doc_date, v.doc_status from vacation v join employee e on(v.emp_id = e.emp_id) where v.emp_id=#{empId} UNION ALL select f.doc_no, f.doc_sc, f.doc_title, e.emp_name, f.doc_department, f.doc_date, f.doc_status from family_event f join employee e on(f.emp_id = e.emp_id) where f.emp_id=#{empId} order by doc_date asc
